name: Surviving Station Six
description:
Surviving Station Six is a top-down survival shooter game that takes place in an apocalyptic space station, once inhabited by humans. You are the last survivor on the station and must try to survive for as long as your will allows it. Different enemies have different strengths and weaknesses. Players must learn these strengths and weaknesses and strategically utilize their gun to defend themselves.

Yodhin Singh: programmer and game designer

Arshad Ousmand: art, level designer, game designer,  sphincter handler.

Caleb McNalley: programmer and game designer

Dylan Bugeja: programmer, UI/UX designer, art

Martin Rose-Harriott: sound designer, music composer, programmer
